alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Box Butte and central Morrill Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 409 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Court House And Jail Rocks, or 30 miles north of Sidney, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 around 420 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
